DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to identify the most appropriate method for managing patients with AF recurrences after the first ablation procedure, through the diagnostic data stored by a subcutaneous AF monitor.
DOC.brief_title: "UNMASKING Study" For Atrial Fibrillation Recurrences Typing in Early Postoperative Period
DOC.criteria: highly symptomatic patients refractory to at least two antiarrhythmic drugs patients with sustained PAF episodes and/or history of PersAF interrupted with cardioversion. congestive heart failure ejection fraction <35% left atrial diameter >60 mm previous ablation procedure
